content: I know how to party #menieres style #106ANDPARTY
Feeling poorly #vertigo ,  hate #menieres  #dizzy #sorryformyself #tinnitus :'(
Right #menieres. You've laid me low for a month. The fight back starts here, with a run along the canal tmrw morning. I'll fucking have you.
I don't know if it's just waking up early again or the cold but my ear is ringing something fierce. #menieres
Pray for my girl tomorrow! She's having ear surgery at 10:15am. Praying & believing that this will fix all of her symptoms! #menieres
...and here comes the vertigo. Oh boy. Nothing to do but curl into a ball & wait for it to stop. Suck it, Meniere's. Blech! #menieres

My ENT, a nice   man, thought it would be a good  idea to test my #menieres. He tilted the chair back, triggering huge vertigo attack. Awful
And the hearing test?Difficult to take: listening for a single tone, while wind plays in good ear, and tinnitus in bad ear roars.#menieres
